ibis.io

Interface DataInput

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    SerializationInput
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BufferedArrayInputStream, ByteSerializationInputStream, DataInputStream, DataSerializationInputStream, IbisSerializationInputStream, SingleBufferArrayInputStream, SunSerializationInputStream

    public interface DataInput
    The DataInput interface provides methods to read data.

    • Method Summary

      • readByteBuffer

        void readByteBuffer(java.nio.ByteBuffer value)
             throws java.io.IOException,
                    java.nio.ReadOnlyBufferException
        Reads into the contents of the byte buffer (between its current position and its limit).
        Parameters:
        value - the byte buffer from which data is to be written
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - an error occurred
        java.nio.ReadOnlyBufferException - is thrown when the buffer is read-only.
